howToPlayInfo:
Use popular card sets or create your own sets that include your friends to play Guess Who 

1) Pick a card from the set 
2) Ask questions and close the cards 
3) Make a guess when ready 
4) First to guess the other card wins 

*Can't ask the same question twice 
*Only 'Yes' or 'No' questions
title: Title
name: Name
deleteSet: Are you sure you want to delete this card set?
deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete all custom card sets?
saveFailInfo1: A card set with the name
cantSaveEmpty: Title field can not be empty
cantSaveLittle: There must be at least 2 card fields
createInfo: Give the room code to your friend and start playing
createStatus: Waiting for other player to join
joinInfo: Join a game with a room code
lockInInfo: Are you sure you want to lock in this card?
lockInRandomInfo: Are you sure you want to lock in a random card?
noCardInfo: You must choose a card to lock in
noCardLockInfo: You must lock in a card to start the game
noCardLockOpponentInfo: Your opponent hasn't picked a card yet
youStartInfo: Ask your friend a question and close unmatching cards. Every question can only be asked once. Only 'Yes' or 'No' questions
opponentStartInfo: Answer your friend's question. Every question can only be asked once. Only 'Yes' or 'No' questions
exit: Are you sure you want to exit?
guessInfo: Making a guess ends the turn without asking a question
lostInfo: Your opponent guessed right. Their card was:
